summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Human Services Department, authorizing an agreement with the University of Washington for financial assistance for participation in a study regarding depression among older adults and to provide treatment services to older adults diagnosed as being depressed, increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1999 budget of the Human Services Department, creating and authorizing the filling of certain positions, and ratifying and confirming prior acts, all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
